0: Director of National Intelligence Dan Coats seemed stunned to learn during a live Q&A that President Donald Trump invited Russian leader Vladimir Putin to the White House. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR During a discussion with MSNBC host Andrea Mitchell at the Aspen Security Forum in Aspen, Colorado, the reporter interrupted their chat to announce the breaking news from the Trump administration. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR “The White House has announced on Twitter that Vladimir Putin is coming to the White House in the fall,” Mitchell said. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Coats paused, leaned in and asked, “Say that again?” as the audience erupted in laughter. NEWLINE_CHAR
